# rtx_l2tp_service (Resource)

Manages L2TP service configuration on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance can exist per router. The L2TP service must be enabled for L2TP/L2TPv3 tunnels to function.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable or disable the L2TP service. When disabled, all L2TP/L2TPv3 tunnels will be inactive.

### Optional

- `protocols` (List of String) List of L2TP protocols to enable. Valid values are 'l2tp' (L2TPv2) and 'l2tpv3'. If not specified, defaults to all protocols when enabled.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
